definitions.definition: feeling happy because something unpleasant has stopped or has not happened; showing this
definitions.sensetop: relieved to see, hear, find, etc. somethingrelieved (that)…

examples.text: You'll be relieved to know your jobs are safe.
examples.contextForm: relieved to see, hear, find, etc. something

examples.text: I'm just relieved that nobody was hurt.
He was clearly relieved when we offered to pay for the damage.
I was secretly relieved when Tony said it was time to turn back.
We were greatly relieved at the news of their safe return.
